Address.value: 3560 BASSETT STREET, SANTA CLARA, California, 95054, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Intevac Inc designs and develops high-productivity, thin-film processing systems. The company's production- proven platforms are designed for high-volume manufacturing of substrates with precise thin-film properties, such as the hard disk drive media, display cover panel, and solar photovoltaic, and advanced semiconductor packaging markets.
